mapper.insert: INSERT INTO adminservice.board (category, title, password_enc, writer, content, post_start_date, post_end_date, checklist) VALUES(#{category}, #{title}, #{password}, #{writer}, #{content}, to_date(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD'), to_date(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{checklist})
INSERT INTO adminservice.address (board_seq_fk, mainAddr, detailAddr, postalcode, typeAddr) VALUES(#{boardSeq}, #{mainAddr}, #{detailAddr}, #{postalcode}, #{typeAddr})
INSERT INTO adminservice.attached_files (board_seq_fk, original_name, saved_name, size) VALUES(#{boardSeq}, #{original_name}, #{saved_name}, #{size})
mapper.update: UPDATE adminservice.board SET category = #{category}, title = #{title}, writer = #{writer}, content = #{content}, checklist = #{checklist} WHERE board_seq = #{boardSeq}
UPDATE adminservice.address SET mainAddr = #{mainAddr}, detailAddr = #{detailAddr}, postalcode = #{postalcode}, typeAddr = #{typeAddr} WHERE board_seq_fk = #{boardSeq}
UPDATE adminservice.attached_files SET original_name = #{original_name}, saved_name = #{saved_name}, size = #{size} WHERE board_seq_fk = #{boardSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT b.board_seq, b.post_start_date as startdate, b.post_end_date as enddate, b.category, b.title, b.password_enc as password, b.reg_time, b.writer, b.content, b.checklist, a.*, array_agg(original_name) AS files FROM adminservice.board b LEFT JOIN adminservice.address a ON a.board_seq_fk = b.board_seq LEFT JOIN adminservice.attached_files af ON af.board_seq_fk = b.board_seq WHERE b.board_seq = #{boardSeq} GROUP BY b.board_seq, startdate, enddate, b.category, b.title, password, b.reg_time, b.writer, b.content, b.checklist, a.*, a.address_seq;

SELECT b.board_seq, b.post_start_date as startdate, b.post_end_date as enddate, b.category, b.title, b.password_enc as password, b.reg_time, b.writer, b.content, b.checklist, a.typeaddr, COUNT(af.board_seq_fk) AS attached_file_count FROM adminservice.board b LEFT JOIN adminservice.address a ON b.board_seq = a.board_seq_fk LEFT JOIN adminservice.attached_files af ON b.board_seq = af.board_seq_fk
WHERE
( b.title ILIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%') OR b.writer ILIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%') )
( b.title ILIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%') )
( b.writer LIKE concat('%',#{keyword},'%') )
AND b.reg_time >= date(#{regstart})
AND b.reg_time <= date(#{regend})
AND a.typeaddr = #{typesearch}
GROUP BY b.board_seq, a.typeaddr ORDER BY b.board_seq DESC;
